bugs.title: CVE-2016-3993 imlib2: off by one error in MergeUpdate

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2016-3993 imlib2: off by one error in MergeUpdate

long_desc.thetext:
A vulnerability was found in imlib2 library. Drawing using coordinates from untrusted source may result in an application crash.

Original bug report:

https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=819818

Created imlib2 tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1323617]
Affects: epel-6 [bug 1323618]
Affects: epel-7 [bug 1323619]

Upstream fix:

https://git.enlightenment.org/legacy/imlib2.git/commit/?id=ce94edca1ccfbe314cb7cd9453433fad404ec7ef

CVE assignment:

http://seclists.org/oss-sec/2016/q2/45
imlib2-1.4.9-1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
imlib2-1.4.9-1.fc22 has been pushed to the Fedora 22 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
imlib2-1.4.9-1.fc23 has been pushed to the Fedora 23 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

This CVE Bugzilla entry is for community support informational purposes only as it does not affect a package in a commercially supported Red Hat product. Refer to the dependent bugs for status of those individual community products.

bugs.title: CVE-2016-4024 imlib2: integer overflow resulting in insufficient heap allocation

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2016-4024 imlib2: integer overflow resulting in insufficient heap allocation

long_desc.thetext:
A vulnerability was found in imlib2. A maliciously crafted filed can cause an integer overflow, which will result in insufficient heap allocation.

References:

http://seclists.org/oss-sec/2016/q2/76

Upstream fix:

https://git.enlightenment.org/legacy/imlib2.git/commit/?id=7eba2e4c8ac0e20838947f10f29d0efe1add8227

Created imlib2 tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1327478]
Affects: epel-6 [bug 1327479]
Affects: epel-7 [bug 1327480]
imlib2-1.4.9-1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
imlib2-1.4.9-1.fc22 has been pushed to the Fedora 22 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
imlib2-1.4.9-1.fc23 has been pushed to the Fedora 23 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

This CVE Bugzilla entry is for community support informational purposes only as it does not affect a package in a commercially supported Red Hat product. Refer to the dependent bugs for status of those individual community products.
